Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DubinsWidget::Step
private

The steps while reacting to mouse clicks.

Enumerator
init 

Initialisation not finished.

selectCfg 

Select the changing configuration.

setStartPos 

Set the start configuration's position.

setEndPos 

Set the end configuration's position.

setStartOri 

Set the start configuration's orientation.

setEndOri 

Set the end configuration's orientation.

nbSteps 

Number of steps.
